node.title: A Journey of Faith
node.description: Steve Kasperbauer and his business partner decided to start a tourist business in Guam. As the business boomed, Steve and his wife decided to buy his partner's share. When unexpected crisis hit Guam there was no where to turn and everything seemed to be headed to complete loss. His once thriving business looked like it was about to colapse until Steve decided to do something radical. To everyone around him, his plan seemed like a sure fail, but when the creator of heavne and earth intervenes there are no limits!
